body_html: I'm going to go out on a limb and suggest that you are setting 'visible_device_list' incorrectly in your ConfigProto, and this has nothing to do with SetDefaultDevice. SetDefaultDevice doesn't touch 'visible_device_list', and the documentation of 'visible_device_list' should clear up what the syntax is supposed to be. Please comment if you disagree and I'll reopen!
